Posts.Content: I have a port and have had it since Nov 2013 and since i have been recieving chemo I dont like ANY1 to touch it.it seems the port has gotten tender to me,when i go in for my weekly blood draws I let them take it outta my arm cause my port is tender,and I have recieving chemo for 4 months,Good luck on your journey and god bless any suggestions to make me feel more comfortable
Posts.Title: pros and cons of pic lines or a port
